name: JUMP! If you can...
description:
JUMP! If you can is a 2D, platform, computer game Jam made in 72h where the player will have to jump and avoid the obstacles in order to complete the levels but with one particularity, at the end of each level a handicap will be added to make it more difficult for the player to reach the end.

Try to get to the end of this fun and challenging game!

Ratings and feedback will be greatly welcomed!
